cmawro/cmawr2/Q005063
x ana askuppi x ŋiri₃-ni ba-da-an-dab X šēpšu iṣbat-ma tebâ ul ileʾʾi X ba-da-an-dab X libbašu iṣbat-ma nīš libbīšu x x a₂-šu-ŋiri₃-bi ba-da-an-dab X mešrêtīšu iṣbat-ma awīlu dabābi ul ileʾʾi {d}asal-lu₂-hi igi niŋ₂ ŋa₂-e ŋen-na dumu-ŋu₁₀ u₄-na₂-am₃ u₄ eš-bar an-na-ka-ka ina ūm purussê ša Ani x {d}utu an-ša₃-ga igi-ni X Šamaš ištu ana qereb šamê pānīšu ina šakāni alan lu₂-uš₁₁-zu munus-uš₁₁-zu X x-x ṣalam im-ma niŋ₂-sila₁₁-ŋa₂ i₃-udu esir DUH-lal₃ X ša bini-ma zi-da-ne-ne ka-ne-ne X X u₃-me-ni-dab imnātīšunu pîšunu šumēlīšunu qinnassunu šuṣbit ka-ne-ne ŋiri₃ a₂ X x x pûšunu ina šēp šumēlīšu x {dug}sila₃-gaz-ta X ina ḫupê šukun-ma igi {d}utu-še₃ niŋ₂-na {šim}li X ina maḫar Šamaš lu₂-u₁₈-lu dumu diŋir-ra-na ŋeštin-sur-ra u₃-me-ni-bal-bal liqqi alan im-ma niŋ₂-sila₁₁-ŋa₂ ŋiri₃-ni X AŠ līser alan i₃-udu DUH-lal₃ esir izi-ta u.mu.i.ni: AŠ qulu {ŋiš}šinig {u₂}in-nu-uš {ŋiš}ŋišimmar-tur gi-šul-hi {ŋiš}šita₂ {ŋiš}eren babbar-ra ka-bi-ta X ina pîšu liʾʾis x x
